duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as the first touch point for all oncology clients’ requests for molecular testing and coordinate specimen acquisition process.
Maintain accurate and complete documentation in client and patient records and review incoming documents for necessary actions.
Utilize multiple computer-based systems to organize client and patient documentation, process cases, and gather data from oncology- and pathology-related organizations.
Coordinate with pathology departments for specimen procurement and shipment, and resolve case discrepancies for missing information.
Review testing information submitted via requisitions and vet adequacy for testing, as well as investigate and interpret patient case status.
Facilitate communication to clients, respond to client issues, and support requests for shipments and materials.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent required, Associate or bachelor’s degree preferred
